name: Word search Quotes
description:
New exciting word puzzle game!
Swipe letters to build words and find hidden quotes.
Enjoy word game and learn quotes from the world's greatest minds to inspire you.

Boost your brain power & keep your mind sharp.
Easy to play game for all ages.
Starts as an easy crossword game and gets harder as you level up!

- Connect letters in any direction to form the hidden word matches!
- Can't figure out the word? Use coins to get a special hint and win the level!
- Daily bonus coins!
- Free 500 coins at the first word game start.
- Easy to play and difficulty increases as you go!
- Play offline or online to train your brain anywhere.
